message: Bob, I'm pleased to offer you this valuable product at a price of $1,000,000. I believe this price reflects its worth and provides you with a significant return on investment. Let me know your thoughts.
I appreciate your offer, Alice, but I was thinking more along the lines of $900,000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to me.

Bob, I understand your perspective and appreciate your willingness to negotiate. While $900,000 is a good offer, I'm still a bit higher than that. I'm willing to come down to $950,000. This is a significant compromise from my initial offer, and I believe it's a fair price considering the value of the product to both of us.

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice, but I'm still a bit above your new offer. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer $925,000. I think this is a fair price considering the value of the product to me.
